author: Lowkeys
post_text: July 11, 2019 at 6:00 PM#1Is there a way to trigger a specific step in a macro with another macro? For example if I have Macro 1 with lines 1-10, I would want macro 2 to "GoTo Macro 1 line 3" and macro 3 to "GoTo Macro Line 7." What would this syntax be? Thanks!

posts.author: Lowkeys
posts.post_text: July 11, 2019 at 6:00 PM#1Is there a way to trigger a specific step in a macro with another macro? For example if I have Macro 1 with lines 1-10, I would want macro 2 to "GoTo Macro 1 line 3" and macro 3 to "GoTo Macro Line 7." What would this syntax be? Thanks!

posts.author: scoobytoobins
posts.post_text: July 12, 2019 at 3:56 AM#2macro 1.x.y where x is the macro number and y is the line. no need for 'go.'

title: GoTo Macro specific line
